LET,

With brand new nodes in all of our US locations (Chicago, Atlanta, and Los Angeles), I have some crazy deals today. There is no limit to how many you can order and the price you see is what you get, the price won't change or increase in following billing cycles!

All plans include 4 CPU Cores. UGVPS is now setting up new servers with more powerful setups. These VPS will be setup on brand new nodes that have SSD Caching for awesome I/O speeds!!
